Try magnet link if it doesn't work

I'd advise people not to download this version.

The fie/folder checks through as clean by Kaspersky Internet Security 2011, but I found that merely highlighting the 'Black Swan' folder caused Windows Explorer to crash without fail almost (when I say almost, I mean 99%) every time I clicked on it. What's more, I had a difficult time removing the file/folder from my PC precisely because of this problem.

It was the *only* file on my PC to cause the temporary crash either when I highlighted the folder, or attempted to open the file. So I guess the file is suspect, though as I say Kaspersky checked it out as clean, and 99% of the time it is right on the money.

I've downloaded this one and found is works perfectly: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6221294/Black.Swan.2010.BluRay.720p.DTS.x264-CHD
CHD's 720p release looks really bad compared to this. Thanks for the sharing, BOZX.
